jobs.description:
•	Participate in a variety of recruitment activities so that the organisation's recruitment process is efficient, effective and equitable.
•	Ensure that all open positions are closed as per the pre decided timelines 
•	Prepare internal and external job advertisements, web postings, specifications for external recruitment agencies and other materials in accordance with the organisation's recruitment standards and business needs so that potential job applicants have the information they need to decide whether, and how to, apply for a vacant position. 
•	Respond to enquiries from candidates, managers and external recruitment agencies about the organization's recruitment activities and about the status of job vacancies so that interested parties are kept informed without compromising the organization's standards of privacy and confidentiality. 
•	Contact candidates, arrange interview times and develop appropriate interview questions in collaboration with the hiring manager so that interviews are conducted efficiently and equitably. 
•	Interview, test, rank, check references, select candidates and provide feedback to unsuccessful candidates based on the job's pre-established selection criteria and the organization's recruitment policies. 
•	Prepare job offer materials in accordance with the agreed job specifications so that successful candidates have all the information they need to decide whether to accept the position.

* Leave and Attendance Management,

* Planning  employee training &development programs,
* Payroll management
*Induction Process

jobs.description:
• Handling centralized HR activities, formulating various HR policies & processes; ensuring that the finalized policies and processes are communicated and effectively implemented.

• Handling end to end Recruitment Process.Identifying vacancies in consultation with Managing Director. Sourcing candidates, conducting interviews, recommending qualified candidates to managers for final interviews, negotiating and closing positions with desirable candidates.

• Match the available resources with business needs, work towards the overall development of the organization by aligning organizational goals with individual goals.

• Resolving queries, ensuring smooth transfer and exit processes. Handling grievances of the employees, maintaining a healthy work environment. Organizing team building events and act as a bridge between the management and the staff.

• Handling the Induction & Joining Formalities,Creating and updating the induction program and presentation. Scheduling and conducting the Induction Program including a detailed presentation about the company, HR policies.

•	Recruitment process includes – sourcing of candidates through job portals like Naukri.com, monster.com as well as LinkedIn, screening them based on the requirement, initial phone screen, coordination with Project Managers and Technical Leads for next round of interviews and coordination.
•	Fully responsible for salary negotiation, onboarding and orientation.
•	Also responsible for other HR Functions that include payroll processing, resource management, office administration, facilities management, grievance handling and conflict management.
•	Researching and recommending new HR Best Practices and helping in the improvement of work culture.
•	Taking initiatives in organizing and coordinating different events and occasion that motivates employees.

•	Screening resumes of applicants and evaluating for specific skills sets.

•	Scheduling interviews and coordinating on boarding of candidates.
•	Also took additional responsibility of General Administration of the company which included manpower management, accounts and billing, vendor management and back-office tasks.

general.headline: Founder and Creator  at The VIP Room
general.description:

jobs.location: Pop Up high end trunk shows
jobs.description:
The VIP Room is a multi-city event conceptualized by Teena Ahuja Kapoor & Tarun Ahuja as a niche Trunk-Show bringing together India’s TOP FIVE to SIX designers under one roof. Entry into the VIP ROOM is strictly By Invitation Only as it caters to the affluent shoppers.

The VIP Room is a very unique concept in India for the following reasons: 
1. The VIP Room showcases clothes that are special and not off-the-rack
2. The VIP Room aims to build an exclusive long-term relationship between the Designer and the buyer. 
3. It is not an Exhibition which caters to walk-ins 

The VIP Room is designed to bring together the elite customers who are ahead of the fashion curve
and will pay a premium for exclusive designs in a focused environment.

Our participants for 2013 were: 
1. Tarun Tahiliani 
2. Falguni and Shane Peacock
3. Pria Kataria Puri 
4. Bhairavi Jaikishan
5. Namrata Joshipura

After an overwhelming response last year we have now put together an equally impressive list for 2014

The VIP Room is super excited to announce this years participating designers:

1. Falguni and Shane Peacock
2. Varun Bahl
3. Amit Aggarwal
4.Shehla Khan 
5. Preeti Chandra 

To get on the guest list you can email me on teena@vip-room.in

1. Seiya Gautam - Filmfare South Red Carpet Appearance in Babita Malkani
2. Shraddha Kapoor - Guest at Bina Goenka's Jewelry Show in Falguni and Shane Peacock
3. Shraddha Kapoor - Bombay Times 2013 Party
4. Dino Morea – Oscar Innerwear, TVC and Print Ad
5. Neha Dhupia - Falguni & Shane Peacock Bridal Fashion Week
6. Prachi Desai - Falguni & Shane Peacock Bridal Fashion Week

In collaboration with the uber-cool Shivan & Narresh & Jaydeep Rajebhosle, I have recently opened the brands first stand-alone boutique at the beautiful Marbela Beach Resort, Morjim, Goa. Showcasing some of their best creations this all glass store is a treat for all swim-wear & resort-wear shoppers in South Goa.

Once the foundation of your dream home is laid out you dont want the interiors to cry out for some company.
This is where I step in!
I specialize in stlying your home. It includes:
1. Marble color

4. Accessories for you bathrooms
5. Bathroom fittings

I also travel overseas as per the client requirement for any or all of the above requirements.

general.description: I am learning and growing enormously.If I was to describe what my team and I do, I will need to summarise it in 3 key things: Discover talented people, Nurture them so that they can liberate their potential and inspire them so they can achieve more. I feel a sense of pride and joy as I get to live my purpose “to lead and inspire people to deliver large-scale transformational change” every single day!

jobs.location: Ganesh Meridian, Near Sola Bridge,SG Highway

jobs.description:
strategic Management
Co-ordination with business leader on strategic implementation work force design, talent management including identifying current and future talent requirements.
Delivery of strategies, utilizing internal resources and external resources as appropriate, to support improved business performance and employee career development.
Conduct job analysis, role description preparation and job evaluations, and work with senior business leaders to maintain an effective organization structure.

Performance Management

Manage the appraisal process across levels and, link it with total rewards and Development planning.
Drive changes in business KRAs / objectives based on changes in organizational priorities, vision and strategy.

Change Agent

Understand the internal needs of the organization and maintain sensitivity to cultural and geographic diversities.
Work in collaboration with senior leadership and other HR functions to permeate organization and culture change in such as organizational restructuring, common job band, and grade & salary structures across all the verticals.
Create employee touch points at across sites, open- house sessions to drive a culture of transparency, foster an open exchange of ideas.

Notable Accomplishments:

Introduced Job band, Grade, Designation and Salary structure with respect to the respective vertical.
Lead the Performance Management system and complete on the time.
Outsourcing the Payroll through third party with the approval of Group HR head and respective business heads. (Foundation, Engineering Consulting organization)

Key Roles and Responsibilities (Not limited to):
Manpower Planning & Organization structuring: Structuring of the organization for optimum utilization of manpower. Enhancing clarity on organization-wide reporting matrix.

Client Management 
1.Understand customer needs and develop plans to address them
2.Identify key staff in client companies to cultivate profitable relationships
3.Resolve customer complaints quickly and effectively
4.Promote high-quality sales, supply and customer service processes
5.Aim to preserve customers and renew contracts
6.Approach potential customers to establish relationships
7.Gain solid knowledge of competitors

Job Description :
1.Preparation of Job Description (JD) for each positions
2.Linkage of JDs with internal & external reporting relationship
3.Coach and build the team working on the projects. 
4.Re-validation of JDs after six months with HODs/ CEO.
 
Recruitment & Induction: Recruitment activities with the principal of “Best fit with least cost”. Exploring innovative ways of recruitment over & above coordinating with the consultants, short listing the resumes and organizing the interviews. Plan and organize the induction for the new joinees. I had charted out one month induction schedule for the GETs and MTs.

Key Responsibility 
Responding to the candidates applied for our advertisements through Email and phone calls. Conducting interviews till final selection.
Offer discussion with the candidate and issue of offer letter and appointment letter.
Continuous up gradation of database and database maintenance up.
Issue of the joining documents to the new recruits.
Verifying the required documents submitted by the candidate at the time of joining and filling it.
Processing the documents submitted by the new joinee to the background verification agency.
Preparation and maintenance of reports like all details of the employees, resource tracker, hiring status, and project information details of employees, resignation details etc.

A multi-skilled HR professional with expertise in solely establishing overall HR function for the start-up organization. High-integrity, energetic known for the ability to envision and create successful outcomes in complex situations. Extensive knowledge of working practices, recruitment, pay, conditions of employment and diversity issues. Pleasant and presentable appearance, communication skills, especially verbal.

Strategic and innovative HR Executive who translates business vision into HR initiatives that improve performance, profitability, growth, and employee engagement. Disciplined and flexible problem-solving approach that balances business goals with employee needs.  

Good understanding of business environment and aligning HR processes and policies in line with the management vision.

I’ve always been a ‘people person’. I love getting to talk to young minds. I always do keep the responsiveness and transparency in my services.

jobs.description:
•	Driving the HR and TA functions in the company
•	Define and implement best practices for people operations 
•	Looking at various functions like performance management, appraisals, employee engagement, onboarding, HR processes, legal etc.
•	Strategize about people thought process - create an annual roadmap that helps the organization achieve its business goals.
•	Work closely with business owners, understand their challenges and empower them to drive their functions with maximum efficiency
•	Work with the TA team to create best practices in the recruiting function
•	Create recruiting strategies that can help us achieve long-term hiring targets
•	Create processes that enable the TA team to meet business hiring objectives in a timely manner, while keeping quality in mind
•	Mentor, motivate and drive the team
•	Be the guardian of our culture - understand the culture and implement methods to reinforce and propagate the culture within the company

A.	Talent Acquisition 
•	Initiated and implemented company's career page for effective recruitment process
•	Collaborate with hiring manager on candidate sourcing strategy and draft advertisements
•	Managing the complete recruitment life-cycle for sourcing the best talent from diverse sources such as job portals, employee referral, company-website, social media
•	Creating compensation fitments and conducting negotiations and providing final offers
•	End to End strategic hiring at junior, middle and senior levels

B.	Joining & Induction
•	Designed and implemented Employee Induction process that help new joinee’s to understand HR policies and procedures

C.	HR Policies 
•	Designed an in-depth employee handbook incorporating major HR polices in conjunction with the company’s overall development
•	Designed and implemented Recruitment Policy for Engineering Graduates, Recruitment Manual

D.	 Employee Engagement & Relationship
•	Organizing weekly & quarterly activities such as fun events, games, competitions, designing mailers,  budgeting;. Entire Calendar planning for Birthdays, Festivals, Days, Cricket League, Carom Tournament, Health Fair, Personal Investment session, Annual Functions

E.	Payroll Management 
•	Using Saral Paypack sotware, set up the master data, managing attendance and absence, leave tracking and overtimes

F.	Performance Appraisal / Management 
•	Introduced objective oriented appraisal process on the basis of KRA's & KPI's and using rating method
•	Introduced the customer satisfaction survey, first formal survey to analyse and improve on process 

G.	Grievance Handling 
•	Develop formal & informal relationship with employees. Analyzing & suggesting corrective measures 

H.	Learning & Development
•	Devised sessions on Business Communication and Latest Technology.
•	Monitored and evaluated sessions through feedback forms

I.	Exit Process 
•	Conducting exit interviews and ensure to retain valuable employees and attrition report

A.	Talent Acquisition
•	End to End hiring of IT and Non-IT profiles. 
•	Evaluated and used various mediums for the hiring of manpower like networking, headhunting, job portals, internal database, database, references and professional sites.

B.	Joining & Induction
•	Handled joining formalities, induction of new joiners. Communicating and help them to understand the policies. 
•	Preparing offer letters, appointment letters, employment contract etc. 

C.	Employee Engagement 
•	Activities like games, lunch party, yoga session, birthday celebrations and smart advantage program.
•	Rewards and recognition to the best employees of the month. 

D.	Payroll, Benefits & Administration
•	Administer payroll and maintaining employee records. 
•	Managing banking transactions and petty cash.

E.	Grievance Handling 
•	Handle employee grievances & implement disciplinary actions. 

F.	Exit Formalities
•	Preparing experience & relieving letter, certificates and other related letters.

G.	Others
•	Taking care of admin functions.

•	Managed events like annual function, festivals, days, party and celebration, board meeting and luncheons.
•	Coordinating between departments and operating units in resolving day-to-day administrative and operational problems.
•	Handling food, transportation and housekeeping department for 700+ students.

general.headline: Sr. HR Executive (Talent Acquisition) at RadixWeb
general.description:
Total 10+ years of Experience
	
	Having 10+ years of work experience in Recruitment industry. 
	Having Experience as an Recruitment/ Team lead & Client Coordination, specialized in   Recruitment with Client Relationship and Business Development.
 Have good experience in recruiting the candidates at various levels (i.e., Requirement Analysis, to On-Boarding). 
	Involved in full lifecycle of recruiting including searching, qualifying, scheduling interviews, rate negotiations, and closing.
	Hands-on Experience with various Job Portals (Naukri.com, Monster.com, Times Jobs, Dice, Career Builder, Yahoo Hot Jobs)
	Hands-on Experience of using Linkedin.
	Hands-on Experience of Search Companies from Google, Job Sites, Manta, Jigsaw etc
	Strong inter-personal skills. Strong written and verbal communications skills, Dynamic team player 

Industry Domain Knowledge: 
-IT industry
-Broking Industry
-Banking industry
-Manufacturing industry
-Infrastructure industry
-Pharma industry
-Hospitality industry
-FMCG Industry
-Oil & Gas Industry

jobs.description:
•	Involved in end-to-end recruitment for our clients.
•	 Identifying the potential candidates through various sources like database, references, advertisement and job portals (Naukri, Timesjob, and Monster, LinkedIn) to fill the budgeted vacancies / replacements.
•	Screening & short-listing of resumes & candidates.
•	Coordinating with clients and scheduling interviews.
•	Following up with candidates till joining.
•	Interacting with the clients, holding discussions, understanding the client’s requirements in respect of the candidate's profile, job description, salary payable and dates of recruitment.
•	Handling all Senior Level and Middle Level Positions.
•	Handling the team of recruiter to close the openings of Clients.
•	Taking the Preliminary Interview for the Client.

•	Manage end to end talent acquisition process.-Browsing the Job portals, LinkedIn and screening the Resumes-Receiving the CVs from employees, candidates-Calling the shortlisted candidates and coordinating the interviews-Coordination with the Functional Heads
•	-Co-ordinating with clients, Developing own clients when required
•	-Understanding of client companies, their industry & requirements-Providing end to end recruitment solutions to the client & the candidates
•	-Invoice Generation, Payment follow-up
•	Recently started Africa Business Development
•	Managing Team of 2 recruiters
•	Responsible for their Performance and their targets

Acheivments:
•	Awarded as a Best Performer of the month for closing Sr. Level IT Position.
•	Closed 18.0lac position with broking sector
•	And also closed senior level HR position.

Candidate Search
•	Responsible for handling Initial Screening of Candidates
•	To understand the requirement of client.
•	To source CV’s (Head Hunting, Referencing, Job Portals etc.) as per client requirements. 
•	To use various job portals for sourcing the appropriate CV like Naukri.com, Monster.com.
•	Initial Screening of the CVs.
•	Sending them mail regarding the Job Descriptions and asking for their updated resume.
•	Maintaining & managing the database of Candidates as well as Clients.
•	Entering Database in to our Software i.e. ATS Application Tracking System
•	Preparing an MIS Report
	Company Search

•	Responsible for managing the company search database.
•	To Search Companies from Google, Job Sites, Manta, Jigsaw etc
•	Search Companies through LinkedIn & searching database through sites or google.
•	Maintaining & managing the database of  Clients.
•	Entering Database in to our Software i.e. ATS Application Tracking System
•	Preparing an MIS Report
